params.contractStorageNumber: Address of the QryptoRand StorageNumber contract.
params.yptoTokenAddress: Address of the ypto token contract.

generateLotteryNumbers(uint8[],uint256,u.custom:reverts: InvalidBetRange if the bet is outside the allowed range.NoNumber if numbers is empty."Not enough unique 5-bit values in input" if drawing quantum random numbers failed.
generateLotteryNumbers(uint8[],uint256,u.details: Enforces min/max bet per number and ensures all logic is stateless.      Emits a {WinningNumbersGenerated} event after each draw.

params.betValue: The value of the bet in smallest unit (1 token = 1e18 unit).
params.numbers: The numbers chosen by the player (up to 4).

returns._0: drawnNumbers The random numbers drawn for this game.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,uint8).custom:reverts: InsufficientFunds if the contract balance is less than the requested amount.InvalidCurrency if the provided currency is not supported."Withdraw failed" if the transaction transfer fails.
withdraw(uint256,uint8).details: Allows the contract owner to withdraw a specified amount of Ether or YPTO tokens.      The function checks for zero withdrawal amounts, sufficient contract balance,      and that the currency type is valid. For Ether withdrawals, it sends the specified      amount to the owner and requires the transfer to succeed. For token withdrawals,      it transfers the requested amount of YPTO tokens to the owner.

params.amount: The amount to withdraw, in the smallest unit (wei for Ether, 1e-18 for YPTO token).
params.currency: The currency to withdraw (Currency.Ether for Ether, Currency.YPTO for YPTO token).

constructor.notice: Deploys the lottery contract with a quantum RNG storage backend.

generateLotteryNumbers(uint8[],uint256,u.notice: Runs a lottery draw for the caller with chosen numbers.

iQrypto().notice: Owner address for iQrypto operator (receives protocol fees, if any).

withdraw(uint256,uint8).notice: Withdraw Ether or YPTO tokens from the contract to the owner.
